products.title: Konya Blackout Steel Grey
products.description: Konyablackout steel grey plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade.

products.title: Metz Pvc Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The metz pvc blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from. Waterproof and flame retardant, metz fabrics are durable and practical. This light-grey, marbled, stone grey blackout roller blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchens.

products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Grey Recycled Roller Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.
